|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7603E; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 150 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The [[Furrion FAN17B82]] is electrically identical with the only difference being a ceiling mount bracket included with the [[Furrion FAN17B8A]]. The RF Test Report document at the FCC describes two modules, each with a MT7603E radio and one antenna. This device may be intended to be used as a wireless repeater with its two 1x1 bgn radios. {{FCC ST|09/25/2019}}
[[Category:English Documentation]]
